entities.name: septumsempra
entities.description: The spell is mentioned in the context of a homework assignment that Harry has to complete.

entities.name: quidditch
entities.description: Quidditch is being played outside, and Harry is unable to hear it while he's in the dungeons with Snape.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as one of the people walking down to the Quidditch pitch with Harry and Ginny.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as one of the people walking down to the Quidditch pitch with Harry and Ron.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as the teacher who has assigned Harry a homework task related to the Septumsempra spell.

relationships.description: Snape has assigned Harry a homework task related to the Septumsempra spell.
Harry is unable to hear the Quidditch game being played outside while he's in the dungeons with Snape.
